message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you. I'm asking for $15000 for it.  Let me know your thoughts!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to consider a price closer to that?

Bob, I appreciate your offer and see that you're interested.  While $12000 is tempting, I'm aiming for a price closer to $13500 to make this work for me.  This would still represent a good value for you, and I'm confident the product will deliver significant benefit.  What are your thoughts on this?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $12000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13000?
